items.title: Figma’s IPO success could push Canva and these other software companies to go public
items.description: D.A. Davidson sees Canva and Databricks as large software companies that could look to take advantage of a hot IPO market and speed up plans to go pub...

items.title: Here’s how to know if the S&P 500 is in the midst of a boom or a bubble
items.description: If you want to know where U.S. stocks are headed, look to the Fed, advises Societe Generale.

items.title: Gold prices are soaring again. Here’s why a new record could be right around the corner.
items.description: U.S. growth, tariff-related inflation worries and a weaker dollar will drive gold to a new record, possibly within three months, says Citi.

items.title: AMD’s stock has more than doubled off its lows. Does that bring earnings risk?
items.description: AMD’s stock rally looks overdone to analysts at Jefferies, who are expecting some pullback after the company reports earnings on Tuesday afternoon.

items.title: Tyson’s chicken business is growing, while beef is losing money even as prices jump
items.description: Tyson’s stock rises as earnings beat expectations, as strength in the chicken business offset weakness in beef.
